name: Marla (˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶)
wishText: Everytime I look back at our years of frienship I can't help but smile. You deserve every bit of happiness that comes your way today and always. Love and miss you ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡
text1: Everytime I look back at our years of frienship I can't help but smile. You deserve every bit of happiness that comes your way today and always. Love and miss you ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday Marlita 🍰♡ ༘*.ﾟ🧸🎀 I hope you are having a very special birthday so far. Looking forward to get to celebreate together and get drunk at a jazz club!🍸🎷
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are really Special to me
outroText: See you soon girly! I hope you have a day full of peace and blessings ˙ᵕ˙
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
